name: Sol Vanguard
description:
You are the Sol Vanguard. Prevent aliens from sucking the heat away from your sun, and return it to its former glory! Though, your ship runs on a limited energy supply, so keep track of your resources!

---CONTROLS---

WASD: Move

Left Click: Shoot [1 energy]   (Shoot the sun to restore its heat!)

Right Click: Dash [1 energy] (Dashing grants you invincibility.)

Space: Heal [2 energy]

---CREDITS---

Made with Game Maker Studio 2

All art created by me, using a modified version of this Lospec palette: https://lospec.com/palette-list/sirens-at-night

Sound effects created with https://jfxr.frozenfractal.com/
